english.ports_message: Configuration tool has found the following ports:
english.ports_notice: If you can't see your board here, make sure the it is properly connected and the program has access to it (admin/sudo rights).
english.ask_avrport: Enter your board serial port (e.g. COM1 (Windows) or /dev/ttyUSB1 (Unix)):
english.ask_anotherport: Do you want to add another board? (y/N):
english.ask_higherdiff: Do you want to use a higher difficulty (only for Arduino DUE boards) (y/N):
english.ask_rig_identifier: Do you want to add an identifier (name) to this rig? (y/N)
english.ask_donation_level: Set developer donation level (0-5) (recommended: 1), this will not reduce your earnings:
english.free_network_warning: Duino-Coin network is a completely free service and will always be
english.donate_warning:
We don't take any fees from your mining.
You can really help us maintain the server and low-fee exchanges by donating.
Visit
english.learn_more_donate: to learn more about how you can help :)
english.thanks_donation:
Thank You for being an awesome donator ❤️ 
Your donation will help us maintain the server and allow further development
english.data_error: Error retrieving data from GitHub! Retrying in 10s.
english.connecting_error: Error connecting to the server. Retrying in 10s
english.error_while_mining: Error while mining - most likely a connection error - restarting in 5s.
english.board_connection_error2: , please check whether it's plugged in or not
english.mining_avr_connection_error: Error connecting to the AVR! Retrying in 10s
english.mining_avr_not_responding: Arduino is taking longer than expected, sending it a new job
english.mining_not_exist_warning: Make sure you've entered the username correctly. Please check your config file. Retrying in 10s
english.load_config_error_warning: /Miner_config.cfg). Try removing it and re-running configuration. Exiting in 10s
